verses.roman:
prakāśānandera śiṣya eka tāṅhāra samāna
sabhā-madhye kahe prabhura kariyā sammāna

synonyms: prakāśānandera śiṣya eka—one of the disciples of Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī; tāṅhāra samāna—equal in learning with Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī; sabhā-madhye—in the assembly of the sannyāsīs; kahe—explains; prabhura kariyā sammāna—respecting Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu seriously.
translation: One of the disciples of Prakāśānanda Sarasvatī, who was as learned as his guru, began to speak in that assembly, offering all respects to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
